id.description: The unique identifier of the feature.

reference_num.description: A reference number associated with the feature.

name.description: The name or title of the feature.

created_at.description: The date and time when the feature was created.

url.description: The URL that provides more details about the feature.

resource.description: The type of resource that the feature represents.

product_id.description: The identifier of the product the feature belongs to.
